actions.name: AddTagsToResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite one or more tags for a specified AWS resource

actions.name: AssociateOpsItemRelatedItem
actions.description: Grants permission to associate RelatedItem to an OpsItem

actions.name: CancelCommand
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a specified Run Command command

actions.name: CancelMaintenanceWindowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel an in-progress maintenance window execution

actions.name: CreateActivation
actions.description: Grants permission to create an activation that is used to register on-premises servers and virtual machines (VMs) with Systems Manager

actions.name: CreateAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a specified Systems Manager document with specified instances or other targets

actions.name: CreateAssociationBatch
actions.description: Grants permission to combine entries for multiple CreateAssociation operations in a single command

actions.name: CreateDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Systems Manager SSM document

actions.name: CreateMaintenanceWindow
actions.description: Grants permission to create a maintenance window

actions.name: CreateOpsItem
actions.description: Grants permission to create an OpsItem in OpsCenter

actions.name: CreateOpsMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to create an OpsMetadata object for an AWS resource

actions.name: CreatePatchBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to create a patch baseline

actions.name: CreateResourceDataSync
actions.description: Grants permission to create a resource data sync configuration, which regularly collects inventory data from managed instances and updates the data in an Amazon S3 bucket

actions.name: DeleteActivation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified activation for managed instances

actions.name: DeleteAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a specified SSM document from a specified instance

actions.name: DeleteDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified SSM document and its instance associations

actions.name: DeleteInventory
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified custom inventory type, or the data associated with a custom inventory type

actions.name: DeleteMaintenanceWindow
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified maintenance window

actions.name: DeleteOpsMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an OpsMetadata object

actions.name: DeleteParameter
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified SSM parameter

actions.name: DeleteParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to delete multiple specified SSM parameters

actions.name: DeletePatchBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified patch baseline

actions.name: DeleteResourceDataSync
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified resource data sync

actions.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a Systems Manager resource policy

actions.name: DeregisterManagedInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified on-premises server or virtual machine (VM) from Systems Manager

actions.name: DeregisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified patch baseline from being the default patch baseline for a specified patch group

actions.name: DeregisterTargetFromMaintenanceWindow
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified target from a maintenance window

actions.name: DeregisterTaskFromMaintenanceWindow
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified task from a maintenance window

actions.name: DescribeActivations
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified managed instance activation, such as when it was created and the number of instances registered using the activation

actions.name: DescribeAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about the specified association for a specified instance or target

actions.name: DescribeAssociationExecutionTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified association execution

actions.name: DescribeAssociationExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to view all executions for a specified association

actions.name: DescribeAutomationExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about all active and terminated Automation executions

actions.name: DescribeAutomationStepExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about all active and terminated step executions in an Automation workflow

actions.name: DescribeAvailablePatches
actions.description: Grants permission to view all patches eligible to include in a patch baseline

actions.name: DescribeDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified SSM document

actions.name: DescribeDocumentParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to display information about SSM document parameters in the Systems Manager console (internal Systems Manager action)

actions.name: DescribeDocumentPermission
actions.description: Grants permission to view the permissions for a specified SSM document

actions.name: DescribeEffectiveInstanceAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to view all current associations for a specified instance

actions.name: DescribeEffectivePatchesForPatchBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about the patches currently associated with the specified patch baseline (Windows only)

actions.name: DescribeInstanceAssociationsStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to view the status of the associations for a specified instance

actions.name: DescribeInstanceInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified instance

actions.name: DescribeInstancePatchStates
actions.description: Grants permission to view status details about patches on a specified instance

actions.name: DescribeInstancePatchStatesForPatchGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the high-level patch state for the instances in the specified patch group

actions.name: DescribeInstancePatches
actions.description: Grants permission to view general details about the patches on a specified instance

actions.name: DescribeInstanceProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to user's Amazon EC2 console to render managed instances' nodes

actions.name: DescribeInventoryDeletions
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified inventory deletion

actions.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocations
actions.description: Grants permission to view details of a specified task execution for a maintenance window

actions.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTasks
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about the tasks that ran during a specified maintenance window execution

actions.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to view the executions of a specified maintenance window

actions.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about upcoming executions of a specified maintenance window

actions.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to view a list of the targets associated with a specified maintenance window

actions.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowTasks
actions.description: Grants permission to view a list of the tasks associated with a specified maintenance window

actions.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindows
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about all or specified maintenance windows

actions.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowsForTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about the maintenance window targets and tasks associated with a specified instance

actions.name: DescribeOpsItems
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about specified OpsItems

actions.name: DescribeParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified SSM parameter

actions.name: DescribePatchBaselines
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about patch baselines that meet the specified criteria

actions.name: DescribePatchGroupState
actions.description: Grants permission to view aggregated status details for patches for a specified patch group

actions.name: DescribePatchGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about the patch baseline for a specified patch group

actions.name: DescribePatchProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to view details of available patches for a specified operating system and patch property

actions.name: DescribeSessions
actions.description: Grants permission to view a list of recent Session Manager sessions that meet the specified search criteria

actions.name: DisassociateOpsItemRelatedItem
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate RelatedItem from an OpsItem

actions.name: GetAutomationExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to view details of a specified Automation execution

actions.name: GetCalendar
actions.description: Grants permission to view details of a specific calendar

actions.name: GetCalendarState
actions.description: Grants permission to view the calendar state for a change calendar or a list of change calendars

actions.name: GetCommandInvocation
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about the command execution of a specified invocation or plugin

actions.name: GetConnectionStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to view the Session Manager connection status for a specified managed instance

actions.name: GetDefaultPatchBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to view the current default patch baseline for a specified operating system type

actions.name: GetDeployablePatchSnapshotForInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current patch baseline snapshot for a specified instance

actions.name: GetDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to view the contents of a specified SSM document

actions.name: GetInventory
actions.description: Grants permission to view instance inventory details per the specified criteria

actions.name: GetInventorySchema
actions.description: Grants permission to view a list of inventory types or attribute names for a specified inventory item type

actions.name: GetMaintenanceWindow
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified maintenance window

actions.name: GetMaintenanceWindowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified maintenance window execution

actions.name: GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTask
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified maintenance window execution task

actions.name: GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocation
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specific maintenance window task running on a specific target

actions.name: GetMaintenanceWindowTask
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about tasks registered with a specified maintenance window

actions.name: GetManifest
actions.description: Grants permission to Systems Manager and SSM Agent to determine package installation requirements for an instance (internal Systems Manager call)

actions.name: GetOpsItem
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified OpsItem

actions.name: GetOpsMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an OpsMetadata object

actions.name: GetOpsSummary
actions.description: Grants permission to view summary information about OpsItems based on specified filters and aggregators

actions.name: GetParameter
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified parameter

actions.name: GetParameterHistory
actions.description: Grants permission to view details and changes for a specified parameter

actions.name: GetParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about multiple specified parameters

actions.name: GetParametersByPath
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about parameters in a specified hierarchy

actions.name: GetPatchBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified patch baseline

actions.name: GetPatchBaselineForPatchGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to view the ID of the current patch baseline for a specified patch group

actions.name: GetResourcePolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve lists of Systems Manager resource policies

actions.name: GetServiceSetting
actions.description: Grants permission to view the account-level setting for an AWS service

actions.name: LabelParameterVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to apply an identifying label to a specified version of a parameter

actions.name: ListAssociationVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list versions of the specified association

actions.name: ListAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to list the associations for a specified SSM document or managed instance

actions.name: ListCommandInvocations
actions.description: Grants permission to list information about command invocations sent to a specified instance

actions.name: ListCommands
actions.description: Grants permission to list the commands sent to a specified instance

actions.name: ListComplianceItems
actions.description: Grants permission to list compliance status for specified resource types on a specified resource

actions.name: ListComplianceSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to list a summary count of compliant and noncompliant resources for a specified compliance type

actions.name: ListDocumentMetadataHistory
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata history about a specified SSM document

actions.name: ListDocumentVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list all versions of a specified document

actions.name: ListDocuments
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified SSM document

actions.name: ListInstanceAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to SSM Agent to check for new State Manager associations (internal Systems Manager call)

actions.name: ListInventoryEntries
actions.description: Grants permission to view a list of specified inventory types for a specified instance

actions.name: ListOpsItemEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about OpsItemEvents

actions.name: ListOpsItemRelatedItems
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about OpsItem RelatedItems

actions.name: ListOpsMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to view a list of OpsMetadata objects

actions.name: ListResourceComplianceSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to list resource-level summary count

actions.name: ListResourceDataSync
actions.description: Grants permission to list information about resource data sync configurations in an account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to view a list of resource tags for a specified resource

actions.name: ModifyDocumentPermission
actions.description: Grants permission to share a custom SSM document publicly or privately with specified AWS accounts

actions.name: PutCalendar
actions.description: Grants permission to create/edit a specific calendar

actions.name: PutComplianceItems
actions.description: Grants permission to register a compliance type and other compliance details on a specified resource

actions.name: PutConfigurePackageResult
actions.description: Grants permission to SSM Agent to generate a report of the results of specific agent requests (internal Systems Manager call)

actions.name: PutInventory
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update inventory items on multiple specified managed instances

actions.name: PutParameter
actions.description: Grants permission to create an SSM parameter

actions.name: PutResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a Systems Manager resource policy

actions.name: RegisterDefaultPatchBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to specify the default patch baseline for an operating system type

actions.name: RegisterManagedInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to register a Systems Manager Agent

actions.name: RegisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to specify the default patch baseline for a specified patch group

actions.name: RegisterTargetWithMaintenanceWindow
actions.description: Grants permission to register a target with a specified maintenance window

actions.name: RegisterTaskWithMaintenanceWindow
actions.description: Grants permission to register a task with a specified maintenance window

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a specified tag key from a specified resource

actions.name: ResetServiceSetting
actions.description: Grants permission to reset the service setting for an AWS account to the default value

actions.name: ResumeSession
actions.description: Grants permission to reconnect a Session Manager session to a managed instance

actions.name: SendAutomationSignal
actions.description: Grants permission to send a signal to change the current behavior or status of a specified Automation execution

actions.name: SendCommand
actions.description: Grants permission to run commands on one or more specified managed instances

actions.name: StartAssociationsOnce
actions.description: Grants permission to run a specified association manually

actions.name: StartAutomationExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate the execution of an Automation document

actions.name: StartChangeRequestExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate the execution of an Automation Change Template document

actions.name: StartSession
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a connection to a specified target for a Session Manager session

actions.name: StopAutomationExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a specified Automation execution that is already in progress

actions.name: TerminateSession
actions.description: Grants permission to permanently end a Session Manager connection to an instance

actions.name: UnlabelParameterVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to remove an identifying label from a specified version of a parameter

actions.name: UpdateAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to update an association and immediately run the association on the specified targets

actions.name: UpdateAssociationStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update the status of the SSM document associated with a specified instance

actions.name: UpdateDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to update one or more values for an SSM document

actions.name: UpdateDocumentDefaultVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to change the default version of an SSM document

actions.name: UpdateDocumentMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to update the metadata of an SSM document

actions.name: UpdateInstanceAssociationStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to SSM Agent to update the status of the association that it is currently running (internal Systems Manager call)

actions.name: UpdateInstanceInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to SSM Agent to send a heartbeat signal to the Systems Manager service in the cloud

actions.name: UpdateMaintenanceWindow
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specified maintenance window

actions.name: UpdateMaintenanceWindowTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specified maintenance window target

actions.name: UpdateMaintenanceWindowTask
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specified maintenance window task

actions.name: UpdateManagedInstanceRole
actions.description: Grants permission to assign or change the IAM role assigned to a specified managed instance

actions.name: UpdateOpsItem
actions.description: Grants permission to edit or change an OpsItem

actions.name: UpdateOpsMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to update an OpsMetadata object

actions.name: UpdatePatchBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specified patch baseline

actions.name: UpdateResourceDataSync
actions.description: Grants permission to update a resource data sync

actions.name: UpdateServiceSetting
actions.description: Grants permission to update the service setting for an AWS account
